synopsis.text: Satoru Fujinuma is a struggling young manga artist who possesses a strange supernatural ability that allows him to travel back in time before life-threatening events, giving him the chance to prevent tragedies. When he is accused of murdering someone close to him, Satoru's ability activates once again, sending him back 18 years to when he was in elementary school. He soon realizes the recent murder may be connected to the disappearance of his shy classmate Kayo Hinazuki. With his second chance in the past, Satoru is determined to uncover the truth behind Kayo's kidnapping and prevent the childhood tragedy that had haunted him for years. However, solving the mystery proves more dangerous than expected, threatening his own safety as well as his friends. Racing against time, Satoru must use his Revival ability to expose the dark secrets of the past and protect his loved ones in the present before the culprit can strike again.
